welcome.noDocuments: Welcome to the Intelligent Document Assistant! Please upload some documents first, and then I can help you analyze their content.
welcome.baseMessage: Welcome to the Intelligent Document Assistant! I have loaded {{count}} document(s) for you.
welcome.selectedPartial: You have currently selected {{selectedCount}} document(s) for querying. I will search for answers in these selected documents.
welcome.selectedAll: You have selected all documents. I will search for answers across all documents.
welcome.noSelection: Please select the documents you want to query on the left, or select all documents to search.
welcome.askQuestion: You can ask me any questions about these documents!

addSourceModal.title: Add Source
addSourceModal.selectType: Please select the type of source to add

uploadModal.title: Upload PDF Documents
uploadModal.notPdfFile: {{fileName}} is not a PDF file and has been automatically removed.
uploadModal.dragText: Click or drag multiple PDFs here
uploadModal.hint: Supports uploading multiple PDF files. After selecting files, please click the confirm button below.

linkUploadModal.title: Add Link
linkUploadModal.placeholder: Enter the link to fetch, e.g., https://example.com/article

renameModal.title: Rename Document
renameModal.enterNewName: Please enter a new file name
renameModal.placeholder: Please enter a new file name

chat.errorOccurred: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.

proChatHelpers.errorOccurred: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.
proChatHelpers.serviceUnavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
proChatHelpers.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your network settings.

ttsButton.generationFailed: Voice generation failed. Please try again later.

quizReader.quizQuestionPrompt: While taking this quiz, I encountered this question: "{{question}}"
quizReader.answerIncorrect: This answer is incorrect. The correct answer is "{{correctAnswer}}"
quizReader.pleaseHelp: Please help me understand why this answer is correct/incorrect and explain the related concepts.
